title: Don't Think That I'll Be Cute Forever! ~If You Make A Wish From The Sacred Stone, You'll Become The World's Strongest Beautiful Girl~
alternative_title: いつまでも可愛くしてると思うなよ！～聖石に願ったら最強の美少女になりました～ ; Itsu Made Mo Kawaiku Shi Teru To Omou Na Yo! ~Hijiriishi Ni Negattara Saikyō No Bishōjo Ni Narimashita~ ; Don't Think That I'll Always Be A Cute Girl!
status: いつまでも可愛くしてると思うなよ！～聖石に願ったら最強の美少女になりました～ ; Itsu Made Mo Kawaiku Shi Teru To Omou Na Yo! ~Hijiriishi Ni Negattara Saikyō No Bishōjo Ni Narimashita~ ; Don't Think That I'll Always Be A Cute Girl!
description:
Description :
        I intended to become the world's strongest "man", but I ended up becoming the world's strongest "woman"...?!The adventurer, Lydel, wanted the sacred stone, "Baetyl's Eye", to make him the strongest "man" in the world. The result? Lydel became strongest, but turned into a girl at the same time. In order for her to return to being a male, Lydel embarks on an adventure to find a new sacred stone, but...?
